If you're looking for a real competitive game, with a passionate community (more than the creators anyway) and price-worthy items, you're not gonna find it so easily in another place. The integration with the Steam platform really helps as well when it comes to the marketplace. Imagine if you're good enough to earn money for your Steam wallet. Sounds cool right? Well. It's not an easy game. You're not just gonna show up and "PWN the noobs". There's a big learning curve, and it takes dedication and real self discipline to be really good. Whether that's enjoyable to you or not is up to your preference.
Great game, recently came back to pc gaming and the strong following behind this game after all the years of release just shows how good this game is!
